Name: 0_judicial_decisions_consultation_ethics
Representative_Docs: ['the ccbe appreciates the opportunity to take part of the ongoing stakeholders consultation on draft ethics guidnes being member of the european alliance and has carefully taken into consideration the draft paper as result of the discussion currently taking place between the experts of the high level expert group helg', 'ccbe comments on the consultation on draft artificial intelligence ethics ccbe comments on the stakeholders consultation on draft artificial intelligence ethics guidnes the council of bars and law societies of europe ccbe represents the bars and law societies of member countries and further associate and observer countries and through them more than million european lawyers', 'the issues and principles set out in this paper are all significant aspects to consider around the use and development of artificial intelligence due to the tight time schedule of the consultation the comments submitted below are general remarks for the purpose of presenting prminary analysis of the issues set out in the draft ethics guidnes for trustworthy and are therefore still subject to any position being developed at later stage by the ccbe on this topic']
